reviews.review_msg: Geoff is awesome - basically how you'd picture a cool professor. Allowed flexibility in final project, assigned fairly interesting readings, lectures were engaging with or without the food he sometimes brought for us. The course kind of blends Econ concepts with Geog concepts, so if that sounds interesting, give this course a try!

Took GEOG333 with him, no exams, just reflection writing after lecture 3 times through the semester that u get 5/5 on as long as u kind of put effort in. Hes a great prof, is in touch with the real world and realizes there is more to life than school. Caring for students and his lectures are great, can be boring at times but its just the material.

Geoff is a prof that really cares about his students. He's always looking for feedback, which most profs don't care about. The concepts in his class were a bit difficult to understand as they are unique and intricate. His assignments are quite easy and it's not too hard to do well in this class (ave was an A-), but you still have to put in effort.

I was really worried I would hate this class, but Dr. Mann made it so much more enjoyable than I ever could have asked for. He hardly made us do any readings, his lectures were engaging, and the assignments were fun. HIGHLY recommend.
So friendly and awesome! There are snacks for the final project at the end of the semester.

Geoff is great at giving lectures! His testing was not hard so if you showed up to class and didn't study you could probably slide by witha B-/C+. His lectures are mandatory because he does surprise participation assignments that count for 10% of your grade. I would take his class again for sure. Not homework heavy at all, sort of read the textbook

Good prof and a very straightforward class. Tests are well-written and he's very passionate. Answers e-mails promptly. A little biased but the class is comprehensive. Textbook and attendance are necessary for 3 random participation quizzes.

Geoff was one of my favourite professors during my first semester at SFU! because of his understanding nature, his hilarious jokes, and overall engaging presence and enthusiasm for Human Geography (GEOG100). If I had studied harder and used the textbook, could have gotten an A. Class is straightforward! Show up, because you'll remember more.

Favourite prof at SFU by far! His lectures are so engaging and he does an amazing job at making the concepts clear and applicable. If you go to class, read the textbook (it's an interesting read) and understand the concepts you have a chance to get a very good grade and learn a lot from this class. 10/10 would recommend.
best professor ive ever had. he's so passionate and knowledgeable which makes lectures super engaging. love him

I am not a geography student but he made me love geography. His examples and world view will make it very easy to understand what is going on in the course. He is passionate in what he teaches which makes it interesting for the students. Very understanding and he is the first prof to schedule a field trip in a university course.
Best Prof Ever at SFU!

Pretty relaxed lectures and course content. Not a lot of examination. Does have a "pop-quiz" for participation that happened twice in the semester. Exams were easy. VERY interesting to listen to him speak - would recommend for any class.

I took his course because I needed a geography credit. He is an amazing lecturer and very interested in the course material. He laughs at his own jokes which makes them even more funny. He should go into politics, he's an economic geographer but I'd vote for him.
Out of the 10 or so classes I've taken hands down best prof. He's funny, the material is interesting, he try to learn your name if you sit near the front and ask occasional question. Geoff is awesome
I honestly thought this class was going to be boring but Geoff made the material relatable and interesting. I learned a lot in this class that will stick with me.
Geoff is one of the best profs at SFU hands down! His lectures are not only informative but also very interesting. I highly recommend any class with Geoff.

Great professor. Very enthusiastic and interesting lectures, was never bored in his class even through the driest material. Gives you choice for the exam questions but designs them so you have to know your stuff to answer them

He is very passionate about what he teaches! His lectures are interesting to sit through. There would be times where in lecture he would go off on many tangents, however it all related back to course material. There was no midterm exam, just a few straightforward assignments and a take home final.

One of the most interesting lecturers you will ever listen to! He's has a great attitude towards his students, he's very approachable and is very easy to talk to. Although sometimes his lectures can be a bit hard to follow. AWESOME PROF!!!

Pretty much exactly what the 2nd poster before me wrote. He's a nice prof and has interesting and creative lectures but can mark a little harsh. He also tends to go off topic and ramble but his class is very enjoyable.

Great professor who kept things interesting. His lecture style was a first for me. He rarely relied on his own notes and even admitted to keeping on track of the notes. Fun little stories also kept you interested. His class was easy, as long as you have a basic understanding of economics,

Geoff is a very enthusiastic guy.  He knows his stuff and is a good lecturer.  I personally did not like this class or his teaching style. His exams and marking was tough.  If you like good lectures and don't mind a low gpa go ahead take his class.
Geoff was great. Very encouraging and a great facilitator.

Dry class content, don't take it unless you need the credits. Geoff tries to make it as interesting and engaging as possible, but if you don't like economics be prepared for some work. Really nice guy, tries to help you out in whatever way possible.

Geoff Mann is really one of the best profs at SFU. like other people said, he is so passionate about the stuff he teaches and thus makes it that more interesting. i wish i could take more courses with him but i'm not a geo major
Best prof in the Geography department. Makes a boring class really interesting. Didn't want to take this course but turned out to be my favorite one.  All profs should be like him.
Geoff is one of the best professors at SFU. His enthusiasm for the subject makes for lectures that are extremely interesting and informative.

Geoff is the best prof at SFU. Very knowledgeable,funny, and an interesting guy. He is very passionate and his enthusiasm is contagious. He has very approachable and if you work hard you will do well! I will take any class he is teaching because he is a great prof. The best prof I've come across
Geoff is the best prof around. He's an enthusiastic funny guy.Makes geography interesting. Definitely take any class he's teaching. Need more prof's like him!!
awesome prof...boring material, but he made the class so interesting. he's the best prof i've ever had. g.mann for president!!

Ever get tired of those profs that read off powerpoints and bore you into insanity? Then this guy is the perfect medication. He is the most energetic prof that I've ever met. Highly recommended for people who want some relevence to the things that they learn in geography with your lives. He has countless stories to tell to make the lecture fun.
One of the best professors I have ever had! He's a great lecturer and makes it all relevant to current events. Pretty damn funny and entertaining too.

Wow.  I love Geoff.  I definately look forward to taking more classes with him! I took Political Economic Geo. Its the best! if you like [hil and you are interested in econ but don't know very much about either, AND you want to know about geo then this is an awesome course.

I have only taken 1 of his courses but I plan on taking any other one he offers. He's entertaining and really interesting. Very approchable and will go into great detail so you really understand the material.
Very intelligent and talented teacher. Good sense of humour, although it seems forced at times. Rewards effort, work hard and you'll do well.
